poppler::toc

 ~toc ()
toc_item * root () const

Detailed Description

Represents the TOC (Table of Contents) of a PDF document.

The TOC of a PDF document is represented as a tree of items.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

toc::~toc (  ) 

Destroys the TOC.

Member Function Documentation

toc_item * toc::root (  )  const

Returns the "invisible item" representing the root of the TOC.

This item is special, it has no title nor actions, it is open and its children are the effective root items of the TOC. This is provided as a convenience when iterating throught the TOC.

Returns:
the root "item"
